pkgmetadata.longdescription: GPS-aware datetime module=========================This package provides GPS time conversion utilities, including agpstime subclass of the built-in datetime class with the addition ofGPS time parsing and conversion methods.Leap second data, necessary for GPS time conversion, is expected to beprovided by the core libc Time Zone Database tzdata (on linux). Iffor some reason the tzdata leapsecond file is not available, a localcache of the IETF leap second record will be maintained: https://www.ietf.org/timezones/data/leap-seconds.listThe package can be executed as a command-line GPS conversion utility.that uses the gpstime module is also included. It is a roughwork-alike to LIGO "tconvert" utility.
